room_title: Escape room "Poe-Ranormal Activity" by Escape Room Live in Washington, D.C.
room_description: You are a team of paranormal investigators from Discovery Channel's 'Destination America' and have been given permission to enter Poe's old chambers in search of a historian who disappeared several years ago in search of a fabled 'Lost Manuscript'! You will be given the latest technology in ghost detecting in order to assist in your quest.
